line.originaltext: 6 cups all-purpose flour
2 cups shredded Cheddar cheese
3 tablespoons sugar
2 (.25 ounce) packages active dry yeast
2 teaspoons salt
2 cups warm milk
1 egg
In a large mixing bowl, combine 3 cups flour, cheese, sugar, yeast and salt.
In a large mixing bowl, combine 3 cups flour, cheese, sugar, yeast and salt.
line.annotation: separate(ing0, ing7, "3 cups flour", ing8, "3 cups flour", "")

line.originaltext: In a large mixing bowl, combine 3 cups flour, cheese, sugar, yeast and salt.
line.annotation: combine({ing1, ing2, ing3, ing4, ing7}, ing9, "batter", "combine")

line.originaltext: In a large mixing bowl, combine 3 cups flour, cheese, sugar, yeast and salt.
Add milk and egg; beat on low speed until smooth.
Add milk and egg; beat on low speed until smooth.
Add milk and egg; beat on low speed until smooth.
line.annotation: mix(ing10, t1, ing11, "beat batter", "beat on low speed")

line.originaltext: Add milk and egg; beat on low speed until smooth.
Stir in enough remaining flour to form a soft dough.
Stir in enough remaining flour to form a soft dough.
Turn onto a floured surface; knead until smooth and elastic, about 6-8 minutes.
Turn onto a floured surface; knead until smooth and elastic, about 6-8 minutes.
Turn onto a floured surface; knead until smooth and elastic, about 6-8 minutes.
Place in a greased bowl, turning once to grease top.
Place in a greased bowl, turning once to grease top.
Place in a greased bowl, turning once to grease top.
Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 1 hour.
Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 1 hour.
Cover and let rise in a warm place until doubled, about 1 hour.
Punch dough down.
Divide in half and shape into two loaves.
line.annotation: separate(ing15, ing16, "one loaf", ing17, "one loaf", "divide in half")

line.originaltext: Place in two greased 9-in.
Place in two greased 9-in.
Place in two greased 9-in.
Cover and let rise until doubled, about 45 minutes.
Cover and let rise until doubled, about 45 minutes.
Cover and let rise until doubled, about 45 minutes.
Bake at 375 degrees F for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown.
Bake at 375 degrees F for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown.
line.annotation: cook(ing16, t5, ing18, "baked bread", "375 degrees F for 25-30 minutes")

line.originaltext: Bake at 375 degrees F for 25-30 minutes or until golden brown.
line.annotation: cook(ing17, t5, ing19, "baked bread", "375 degrees F for 25-30 minutes")

line.originaltext: Remove from pans to cool on wire racks.
Remove from pans to cool on wire racks.
Remove from pans to cool on wire racks.
Remove from pans to cool on wire racks.
